# sourcePort

**Instance Property**

The port number of the system that opened the connection.

## Declaration

```swift
var sourcePort: UInt32 { get }
```

## Discussion

When the guest operating system opens a connection, this property contains the port number that the guest specified. When you open a connection to the guest operating system from your [doc://com.apple.virtualization/documentation/Virtualization/VZVirtioSocketDevice] object, this property contains a randomly generated port number.

## Getting the connection details

- **destinationPort**: The destination port number of the connection.
- **fileDescriptor**: The file descriptor to use when sending data.
